metadata.Title: CVE-2009-3800

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP3 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP3 for x86

metadata.Description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Adobe Flash Player before 10.0.42.34 and Adobe AIR before 1.5.3 allow attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.
